title: The Inspector General 1949 (American Technicolor musical comedy film) Danny Kaye, Barbara Bates

sources.title: The Inspector General 1949 (American Technicolor musical comedy film) Danny Kaye, Barbara Bates
sources.description:
The Kaye way to chaos and corruption.
An illiterate stooge in a traveling medicine show wanders into a strange town and is picked up on a vagrancy charge. The town’s corrupt officials mistake him for the inspector general whom they think is traveling in disguise. Fearing he will discover they’ve been pocketing tax money, they make several bungled attempts to kill him.

Original title: The Inspector General (1949) AKA: Happy Times
This film has English, German & Spanish audio, and is subtitled with many language options.

Director: Henry Koster
Writers: Philip Rapp, Harry Kurnitz 
Stars: Danny Kaye, Walter Slezak, Barbara Bates, Elsa Lanchester, Alan Hale 
Genres: Classics, Comedy, Musical, Romance
Budget: $2,873,000 (estimated)
